attributes.action: Remove the "bulk rubbish" fee in central London
attributes.additional_details: Westminster has introduced few years ago the charge for "bulk rubbish" transforming our streets into dumping grounds as people try to avoid the £20 fee.  An increasing numbers of fridges, TVs, washing machines, mattresses and wardrobes (including mirrors and glass shelving) is being dumped in the streets making them undecent and unsafe. Especially for kids or at night.  This petition asks to revert to the previous collection service allowing three collections a year per household. ______________________________________________________ MAKE YOUR VOICE HEARD by signing this petition...................... MAKE YOUR VOICE EVEN LOUDER (once signed) by sharing this page with your friends on Facebook. ______________________________________________________ Thank you for helping us out.
